snippet: China's shadow banking firms slashed lending to property developers in the first half of this year, closing off a crucial funding avenue just as the housing market cools, potentially spelling trouble for the sector and the broader economy....

headline.print_headline: Chinese Property Developers at Risk as Trust Funds Dry Up
headline.main: Chinese Property Developers at Risk as Trust Funds Dry Up

lead_paragraph: China's shadow banking firms slashed lending to property developers in the first half of this year, closing off a crucial funding avenue just as the housing market cools, potentially spelling trouble for the sector and the broader economy.
